primary_diagnosis.justification: History confirms recurrent depressive episodes without intervening mania or hypomania. The current episode is moderate, supported by persistent symptoms significant enough to warrant initiation of an SSRI (*Sertraline*) approximately 4 weeks ago.
dsm_criteria_met: Meets criteria for a Major Depressive Episode (MDE).
History of at least one previous MDE.
No history of manic or hypomanic episodes (Rules out Bipolar).

ruled_out.reason: The Clinical Entity Agent confirmed the patient denies any manic or hypomanic episodes, strongly suggesting a unipolar course.
History confirms a recurrent pattern of depression, not a single episode.

While passive ideation is noted, it is a symptom of the primary condition (F33.1) and should not be coded as a separate, primary mental health diagnosis unless it significantly impacts treatment planning outside the context of the MDD.
